fields.name: Q: How do I stake?
fields.value:
A: Go to https://stake.kishimotoinu.com
The how to stake video can be found here: https://www.reddit.com/r/KishimotoInu/comments/rag04j/saitama_staking_rewards_now_available/

fields.name: Q: How long can I stake for?
fields.value: A: You can stake and unstake at anytime. You will only receive rewards for the period you locked your tokens for.

fields.name: Q: Why is staking beneficial?
fields.value: A: It removes tokens out of circulation for the amount of time the tokens are staked by our investors. This thus help increase the price of the tokens. In terms for the holders, a generous APR% will ensure the holders greatly receive kind rewards for staking. This should be enough to cover your fees and make you a nice return on your investment.

fields.name: Q: I hold my tokens on coinbase wallet but want to move to metamask without the paying the expensive gas fees!
fields.value:
A: You can import your coinbase wallet into metmask without the need to move tokens or pay fees. Guide here:
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=iIBzKl4ZHd0

fields.name: Q: Where did the team get the tokens to use for staking rewards?
fields.value: A: 520 ETH (currently) buy back tokens are being used to reward you all for staking.

fields.name: Q: Can we stake if we hold BSC Kishimoto?
fields.value:
A: You can do on the following link:
https://dapps.padswap.exchange/lpfarms/

fields.name: Q: I hold my tokens on an exchange, how can i stake?
fields.value: A: You will need to withdraw from the exchange into an ethereum based wallet like Metamask or Trust wallet to be able to stake.
